scripts.setup:all: npm run setup:desktop && npm run setup:mobile && npm run setup:python
scripts.build:all: npm run build:desktop && npm run build:mobile && npm run build:python
scripts.build:mobile: cd mobile && npm run build:android && npm run build:ios
scripts.build:python: cd python-lib && python setup.py sdist bdist_wheel
scripts.test:all: npm run test:desktop && npm run test:mobile && npm run test:python
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:desktop && npm run lint:mobile
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:desktop && npm run clean:mobile && npm run clean:python
scripts.clean:mobile: cd mobile && rm -rf node_modules android/app/build ios/build
scripts.release:prepare: npm run test:all && npm run build:all
scripts.release:mobile: cd mobile && npm run build:android && npm run build:ios
